ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But his Lord chose him and made him one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then his Lord chose him and placed him among the upright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But his Lord exalted him, and included him among His righteous servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But his Lord chose him as His Prophet and made him one of the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: His Lord therefore chose him and made him among those deserving His proximity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then his Lord chose him, and He made him of the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But his Lord had chosen him, and He placed him among the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But his Lord chose him and placed him among the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But his Lord chose him for His own and made him one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So his Lord chose him and made him one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus did his Lord choose him and make him of the Company of the Righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But his Lord had chosen him and He placed him among the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But his Lord chose him, and made him one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:50] But his Lord chose him, for prophethood, and made him one of the righteous, the prophets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But his Lord chose him) to make repentance (and placed him among the righteous) among the messengers.
